meanings.sent1: The toy made the bloopiest noise when squeezed.
meanings.sent2: The bloopiest sound came from the old radio.
meanings.sent3: The bloopiest sound from the faucet made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: The bloopiest notes from the piano filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The bloopiest sound of the bubble popping was delightful.

meanings.sent1: She won the contest for the bloopiest costume.
meanings.sent2: The bloopiest in the group was easy to spot.
meanings.sent3: The bloopiest of all the cupcakes was gone in seconds.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was the bloopiest in the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The bloopiest of the balloons floated highest in the sky.
